thread.title: Alexis Forbes
thread.title_full: Sport Systems reviewed by Alexis Forbes

author: Alexis Forbes
title: Alexis Forbes
text:
Great, and fast speedy customer service. Sport Systems got back to me, provided me a Quote: fair and affordable Quote: , custom made the pole pads to my specifications and shipped them before I had received a solid Quote: from the competitors.
Very impressed with the quality and will defnitiely look at purchasing other merchandise in the future.
